Texts.Chs: 干的不错。你收割了你的庄稼了吗？如果没有的话，用这些^orange;桶^white;开始下一步。
Texts.Eng: Great. Did you harvest your crops yet? Do that, if not. Also, take these ^orange;buckets^white; for the next step.

Texts.Chs: 接下来，你需要做的是^green;酵母水^white;。使用^orange;水^white;和^orange;小麦^white;在糖化桶里发酵出3份粮食水。并在其中添加^orange;糖^white;使其在桶中慢慢发酵，最终的产物就是酵母水了。
Texts.Eng: Next, you'll need to make ^green;yeast water^white;. Use ^orange;water^white; and ^orange;wheat^white; in the Mashing Tun to make 3 Grain Water. Use ^orange;sugar^white; with the grain water in the mashing tun to make Yeast Water.
